subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Perhaps the difference between upstart Florida last season and the defending champion Gators this season shows most in Joakim Noah, who shows a lot of tension in his deeds and in his words.
snippet: Perhaps the difference between upstart Florida last season and the defending champion Gators this season shows most in Joakim Noah, who shows a lot of tension in his deeds and in his words.
